statements: SELECT * FROM customer_accounts;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer_accounts WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer_accounts WHERE last_login > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customer_accounts ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, security_question FROM customer_accounts WHERE security_answer IS NULL;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer_accounts WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customer_accounts WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, last_login FROM customer_accounts ORDER BY last_login DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer_accounts WHERE last_login > '2021-01-01' AND security_question IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer_accounts WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY profile_update_timestamp DESC;
SELECT customer_id, profile_update_timestamp FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE profile_update_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers JOIN password_resets ON customers.customer_id = password_resets.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, profile_update_timestamp FROM customers WHERE profile_update_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customer_accounts;
SELECT username, email FROM customer_accounts WHERE customer_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM password_resets ORDER BY reset_timestamp DESC;
SELECT customer_id, reset_timestamp FROM password_resets WHERE reset_id > 5;
SELECT updated_field, new_value FROM profile_updates WHERE customer_id = 20 ORDER BY update_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_accounts WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, username, email FROM customer_accounts WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT customer_id, reset_timestamp FROM password_resets ORDER BY reset_timestamp DESC;
SELECT customer_id, updated_field, new_value FROM profile_updates WHERE update_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customer_accounts JOIN password_resets ON customer_accounts.customer_id = password_resets.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_accounts ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer_accounts WHERE last_login > '2021-01-01';
SELECT account_id, customer_name, email FROM customer_accounts WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM password_resets WHERE reset_token IS NOT NULL ORDER BY request_date DESC;
SELECT account_id, attempt_date, success FROM login_attempts WHERE success = false ORDER BY attempt_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_accounts WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT account_id, email, last_login FROM customer_accounts WHERE last_login > '2022-09-01';
SELECT account_id, customer_name FROM customer_accounts WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM profile_updates WHERE update_date BETWEEN '2022-09-01' AND '2022-09-30';
SELECT account_id, attempt_date, success FROM login_attempts WHERE success = false ORDER BY attempt_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer_accounts WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM password_resets ORDER BY reset_requested_at DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, updated_field FROM customer_accounts JOIN profile_updates ON customer_accounts.customer_id = profile_updates.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, log_description, logged_at FROM customer_accounts JOIN account_logs ON customer_accounts.customer_id = account_logs.customer_id WHERE customer_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT question_text FROM security_questions WHERE answer_hash = 'sample_hash_value';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer_accounts WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email, password_hash FROM customer_accounts WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM password_resets WHERE reset_requested_at > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT customer_name, updated_field, new_value FROM customer_accounts JOIN profile_updates ON customer_accounts.customer_id = profile_updates.customer_id;

SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_logs, customer_name FROM account_logs JOIN customer_accounts ON account_logs.customer_id = customer_accounts.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name HAVING total_logs > 10 ORDER BY total_logs DESC;
